channel.title: Js Library on KrolTech
channel.description: Recent content in Js Library on KrolTech

item.title: AnimationFramework – simple scripted animations!
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: A simple, yet flexible, animation framework to create scripted animations.

item.title: PhotoFlipper.js – 3D flip your photo/gallery
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: I added another item to my github, a 3D css image rotator/randomizer.

item.title: ScrollToggle – detect scroll location and trigger events
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)

item.title: ShiftPanes.js – Shiftable content panes
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: My second JavaScript library in as many days! This new one is called ShiftPanes (like my original names huh?!). Basically, it allows you to declare a container that will hold “pageable” blocks of content within it. It is, again, pretty basic and no frills. Just declare a container with any class you want, and inside declare multiple containers each with the same (different from the container) class that will act as “panes” (or pages).

item.title: SlideIns.js – Animate content into a page
item.author: jkat98@gmail.com (Jason Krol)
item.description: This is my first ever public JavaScript “library” and also my first GitHub! SlideIns.js is just simple jQuery code that allows you to have content on a page “slide in” from left, right, or middle (middle just fades in basically). This concept was taken from Apple.com pages, where they recently started having little subtle animations featured on their pages – for example as you scroll down an iPad or iPhone might slide in from the right of the screen.
